disclaimer_text:
This project ('Stronghold Map Unlocker') is not affiliated with Firefly Studios or official games such as Stronghold, Stronghold Crusader, etc.
It is a private, non-commercial fan project developed independently.
dialogs_about_body:
- Lists Steam Workshop maps
- Copies & patches BASE+0x08 = 0x00
- Saves as [unlocked].map
dialogs_workshop_pick:
No valid workshop folder found or no .map files present.
Please choose the workshop folder manually.
dialogs_select_at_least_one: Please select at least one map.
dialogs_permission_admin_hint:
A permission issue occurred.
Please run the app as Administrator (File → Restart as Administrator…).
dialogs_permission_generic_hint:
A permission issue occurred.
Please check your access rights to the folders/files.
dialogs_admin_restart_only_windows: Admin restart is only supported on Windows.
logs_workshop_chosen_no_maps: Workshop path chosen: {path} (no maps found yet)
logs_workshop_prompt: No default workshop path found – please choose a folder…
